message_text: This flow shows the functionality of the character, character_media and character_display columns.
This text is said by @fields.neighbour. A neutral image of neighbour is displayed in front of this text.
This text is said by @fields.neighbour. No image of neighbour is displayed.
This text is said by @fields.neighbour. A happy image of neighbour is displayed in front of this text. The link to this image is the happy_asset associated to neighbour in the character_names sheet.
This is the end of the character example flow.
